name: 葉芳耀
objective:
本課程主要教導學生運用矩陣的方法，包括力法(柔度法)與位法(勁度法)，分析結構學中之靜定與靜不定結構問題，求解結構體因外力而產生之變形與構件之內力。課程內容包括：1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題。
Introduces the matrix structural analysis method, including force and displacement method, to solve the structural deformations and find internal member forces. The contents of course including: 1.matrix analysis, 2.indroduction of matrix structural analysis, 3.the stiffness method, 4.analysis of trusses, 5.analysis of beams, 6. analysis of rigid frames using the stiffness method.
